short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For a mouseless future, but on chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mouseless enables the user to navigate through webpages by using vim-like keybindings. 

Some of the features are: opening links in a new tab, in a new (private) window, copying the link to clipboard and much more. 

âš™ Set your preferred keybindings in the options or use the default ones.
